description:
Two years ago, Rei was spending sleepless hours searching for his brother trapped in the sea of the `net. But just as he caught Leviathan`s trail, he ended up in danger of being hacked himself! Just then... Hackmon appeared!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae no Chikara o Ore ni Kase: Rei to Hackmon, Ano Hi no Deai
Share Your Power with Me. The Meeting of Rei and Hackmon.
お前の力を俺に貸せ レイとハックモン, あの日の出会い
